description: Spontaneous outings are part of summer life, and with these light, airy trousers you’re always ready for a quick hike or bike ride to the forest or beach. The legs are slightly tapered and have reflective drawcords at the endings – easy to pull out for visibility when it gets dark. Made from a lightweight, quick-drying stretch fabric in recycled polyamide, they are perfect for everyday life and travelling in warm climates.
name: Fjallraven High Coast Lite Trousers - Mens
